name: のり男子っ‼【体験版】
description:
Would you like to live a sweet and funny school life with four good-looking noris?


【Story】
This is a world where "nori" and "rice" exist as a race.
The union of "nori" and "rice" is called "omusubi" and many people long for a beautiful "omusubi".

The main character, Akita Komachi, transfers to a prestigious high school, "Omusubi Gakuen", in order to meet a wonderful nori as a rice from a good family.
What awaited Komachi were four wonderful "good-looking noris" ......!
Which "nori" will you "omusubi" with ......?


【Game Outline】
・Game genre：Romance adventure game
・Characters to capture：４ noris
・Character voice：Partial only
・Route Branching：None(To be implemented in the full version)
This game aims to "Omusubi" with "Nori", the target of the game, while reading the story.

This game was created by graduates of Vantan Game Academy.
Development of the game began while the students were still in school, and now a trial version has been completed with the cooperation of Vantan Game Academy.
